summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: the unauthenticated EmptyState tagline is updated to exactly “An AI-powered detective tool.” in EmptyState.tsx, and the prior longer tagline is not present in the provided diff snippet. However, two additional non-requested files were modified (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified internal metadata/state tracking files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json), which were not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the pre-login EmptyState tagline text; it did not request updates to repository summary/state files.
